content.description: The diagram below represents steps in the phosphorus cycle.
content.question: Which of the following statements is best supported by the diagram of the phosphorus cycle?

choices.label: The largest reservoir of phosphorus is in the atmosphere.
The phosphates absorbed by animal tissue through consumption eventually return to the soil.
Plants take up the phosphate ions primarily from the metamorphic rocks.
Phosphates are not soluble in water.

content.answer: The phosphates absorbed by animal tissue through consumption eventually return to the soil.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
